definitions.definition: An unstable elementary particle which is a type of lepton , having a mass almost twice that of a proton , a negative charge , and a spin of ½ ; it decays into hadrons (usually pions ) or other leptons, and neutrinos .

main_definition: An unstable elementary particle which is a type of lepton , having a mass almost twice that of a proton , a negative charge , and a spin of ½ ; it decays into hadrons (usually pions ) or other leptons, and neutrinos .
